alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cecil; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 3:58AM EST until January 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northern Maryland. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...While a few flurries or light snow showers may occur this morning. Steadier snow is expected to begin this afternoon and continue through tonight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cecil; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Southeast Harford; Southern Baltimore
